price: 27. Les djinns, Nous les avons créés avant (les hommes) d’un feu ardent.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
